concept.title: Creating a customization plugin
concept.shortdesc: The steps required to create a customization plugin does not differ from others DITA-OT plugin.

section.title: Ant import extension point
section.p: The ant target dita2d4p-html5 has the dita:extension org.dita.dost.platform.InsertDependsAction

section.title: XSLT import extension point
section.p: The XSL template map2html5_template.xsl has the extension point id xsl.transtype-html5
